resources.string: All Things AMD is an app designed to help you stay up to date with all things AMD! Check out the latest releases of CPU\'s and GPU\'s from Team Red!

AMD\'s lineup of desktop processors are here to deliver the absolute best performance for whatever you may need. The Ryzen chips provide all the computing power you\'ll need with minimal effects on power draw and thermals.
The Radeon lineup of GPU\'s from AMD boast the same reputation as the Ryzen CPU\'s, providing you with the graphical processing strength that rivals even NVidia.
DISCLAIMER: This app serves only as a project for an assessment submission, borne of a passion towards AMD and their products. No monetization of any sort is present within this application.
